pMassSettings Class Reference
[RigidBody]

Class describing a rigid bodies mass offset. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

  • float newDensity
    Density scale factor of the shapes belonging to the body

    • Range: [0,inf)
    • Default: [0).

  • float totalMass
    Total mass of the actor(or zero).

    • Range: [0,inf)
    • Default: 0.0f.

  • VxVector localPosition
    Local position offset

    • Range: [vector)
    • Default: (0,0,0).

  • VxVector localOrientation
    Local orientation offset

    • Range: [0,inf)
    • Default: (0,0,0).

  • CK_ID massReference
    Reference object to determine the mass local position. The members "Linear" and "Angular" are being used to transform the final matrix.

    • Range: [object)
    • Default: 0.

Detailed Description

Class describing a rigid bodies mass offset.
